meanings.definition: Resembling canvas in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The canvaslike fabric felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted on a canvaslike material to create a unique texture.
meanings.sent3: The canvaslike bag looked like it could hold a lot of groceries.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt as canvaslike as the sails of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The canvaslike texture of the wall added depth to the room.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of canvas.
meanings.sent1: The canvaslike material was sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent2: The tent had a canvaslike appearance, perfect for camping.
meanings.sent3: The canvaslike umbrella protected her from the rain in style.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a canvaslike quality, deep and resonant.
meanings.sent5: The canvaslike texture of the painting gave it a classic feel.
